actions.name: AssociateNode
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a node to a configuration management server

actions.name: CreateBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a backup for the specified server

actions.name: CreateServer
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new server

actions.name: DeleteBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified backup and possibly its S3 bucket

actions.name: DeleteServer
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified server with its corresponding CloudFormation stack and possibly the S3 bucket

actions.name: DescribeAccountAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the service limits for the user's account

actions.name: DescribeBackups
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a single backup, all backups of a specified server or all backups of the user's account

actions.name: DescribeEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all events of the specified server

actions.name: DescribeNodeAssociationStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the association status for the specified node token and the specified server

actions.name: DescribeServers
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the specified server or all servers of the user's account

actions.name: DisassociateNode
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a specified node from a server

actions.name: ExportServerEngineAttribute
actions.description: Grants permission to export an engine attribute from a server

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags that are applied to the specified server or backup

actions.name: RestoreServer
actions.description: Grants permission to apply a backup to specified server. Possibly swaps out the ec2-instance if specified

actions.name: StartMaintenance
actions.description: Grants permission to start the server maintenance immediately

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to apply tags to the specified server or backup

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified server or backup

actions.name: UpdateServer
actions.description: Grants permission to update general server settings

actions.name: UpdateServerEngineAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to update server settings specific to the configuration management type
